summary: November 15 is the 319th day of the year  in the Gregorian calendar.
full_text: Larry Melvyn Evans  was an American chess grandmaster, author, and journalist. He won or shared the U.S. Chess Championship five times and the U.S. Open Chess Championship four times. He wrote a long-running syndicated chess column and wrote or co-wrote more than twenty books on chess.
title: Larry Evans
